abstracts.cdata!:
This memorandum summarizes the progress
            made under the Sustainable Access to Finance Development
            Policy Loan (DPL) to the Kingdom of Morocco. The Bank
            approved the two tranche US$200 million loan to the
            Government of Morocco on 26 January, 2010, and the loan
            agreement was signed and declared effective on 15 February,
            2010 and 4 March, 2010 respectively. The following
            memorandum notes that all prior actions required for the
            release of the second tranche have been met by the borrower
            as outlined in the loan agreement. Compliance with all prior
            actions was verified by World Bank supervision missions and
            collection of supporting evidence. The memo describes the
            macroeconomic policy framework of the Borrower, and ensures
            that it is appropriate and is consistent with the objectives
            of the program.
